remarks: A frequently used special case of ~ rspc2ev for operation values, analogous to ~ rspceov .  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 26-May-2017.)
statement:
rspceaov $p |- ( ( C e. A /\ D e. B /\ S = (( C F D )) ) -> E. x e. A E. y e. B S = (( x F y )) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x y $.
$d C x y $.
$d D y $.
$d F x y $.
$d S x y $.
